explanation: Funds are required for efforts by USSOUTHCOM to expand cooperation or improve the y capabilities of our allies and partners in the USSOUTHCOM area of operations pursuant to section 8066 of if division A of Public Law 118-47, the Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024. This is a congressional special interest item.

The funds were appropriated for transfer in section 8066 of division A of Public Law 118-47, the Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024 for efforts by USAFRICOM ($50 million) and USSOUTHCOM ($50 million) to expand cooperation or improve the capabilities of our allies and partners in their areas of operation. This transfer document only reflects the portion of the funding designated for USSOUTHCOM. This is a congressional special interest item.
